boat.name: Birthe Marie
boat.full_description: Log A-W/95, Nov/97 Built in Denmark as a fishing boat. Hull featured a wet well amidships built with an engine. Bought in Copenhagen in decommisioned state and imported to England as a deck cargo. Converted for use as a pleasure craft by P Barker of Burnam on Couch.  Sold on several times. bought by M. Jardine in 2005 for convertion to sailing charter boat for use in the Hebridies. Partially rebuilt at Amble boat Co Hull work mainly by Jeff Mathew and then trailered to Scotland for completion by M Jardine and helpers. coded for commercial use in 2011 and now operating as a sightseeing day boat out of Iona under sail
boat.construction_details: Carvel Baltic pine and  Larch on Oak
